ModMetaData.name: BattIePatch: Psychic Silence Is Golden
ModMetaData.author: BattIeBear
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6
This mod makes Psychically Deaf pawns slightly better in the Anomaly DLC, by making them immune to the Golden Cube's fascination and being targeted by the Unnatural Corpse. Psychically Deaf pawns will still be targeted by the Revenant, but the Hypnosis will not effect them.
Think this mod should include more features? Found an issue? Leave a comment!
